title: To provide indemnification and liability protection to, and facilitate the procurement of insurance for, contractors responding to the World Trade Center attacks.
content: World Trade Center Worker and Contractor Protection Act - Provides for Federal indemnification and liability protection to contractors or volunteers in connection with their response to the World Trade Center attacks by undertaking rescue and evacuation, recovery of bodies, clean up, environmental remediation, removal and transportation of debris, control of pollutants, securing of public and private property, and protection of the public health, safety and welfare.
